Package com.example.fairdraw.Activities

package com.example.fairdraw.Activities
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminEventsPage
     
    AdminManageProfiles
     
    AdminNotificationLogActivity
     
    AdminPicturesPage
     
    BaseTopBottomActivity
    Base activity that provides common top/bottom navigation wiring used by entrant screens.
    CreateEventPage
    Activity for creating a new event.
    DeepLinkRouterActivity
    Small helper Activity that routes app-specific deep links to an internal Activity class.
    EditEventPage
    Fragment used to edit an existing Event.
    EditProfileActivity
     
    EntrantEventDetails
    Activity that displays detailed information for a single Event to an entrant.
    EntrantHomeActivity
    EntrantHomeActivity displays the home screen for entrants, showing a list of events and allowing navigation to other parts of the app such as the organizer page, scan page, and notifications.
    EntrantMyEventsActivity
     
    EntrantNotificationsActivity
    Entrant screen: listens to entrants/{deviceId}.notifications and displays them.
    EntrantScan
    Activity that provides a continuous barcode/QR code scanner for entrants.
    MainActivity
    Developer playground activity used during development to test image uploads, notifications and navigation to various screens.
    OrganizerMainPage
    Activity for the organizer main page.
    OrganizerManageEvent
    OrganizerManageEvent class allows organizers to manage event details, view and manage entrants, and send notifications.
    OrganizerWaitListMapActivity
     
    ProfileActivity
    ProfileActivity displays the user's profile information and allows editing and deletion of the account.
    SignUpActivity
    Screen used to create a new user account.
    SplashActivity
    Launcher activity that determines whether the app should route to the sign-up flow or the entrant home experience based on whether a user document exists for the current device.
    TestDeepLinkActivity
    Minimal test activity used to display all Intent extras for debugging deep links.
